name: group_t_test_from_database
description: Perform an independent t-test (Student or Welch) on two groups using data from a SQLite database.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: SQL FROM clause (e.g., table name or JOIN expression).

category_col.description: Grouping column (categorical). Even if originally int, will be cast to str during grouping.

value_col.description: Column containing numeric values to compare.

where_clause.description: Optional SQL WHERE clause (without the 'WHERE' keyword).

where_params.description: Optional list of parameters for the WHERE clause.

group_names.description: Optional: Specify exactly two group values to compare.

equal_var.description: If true, assume equal variance (Student's t-test). If false, use Welch's t-test.

dropna.description: Whether to drop rows with missing values.
